body: hi there, first thanks for this plugin ! i have some problems with my surface, that gets no illumination at all.(which is not true, pls have a look at the ss) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/iFakCrEkllHxD*RObD5s8FGnr2PUCYX7ItfVvPLR0M*i*qg*TT3vyLwWkq1PxClHN9BwLaejLp0sErsLRMHZuD1RSbEf31Xa/ladyBug.jpg) strange thing is that it already worked. and what is the disFromBase good for ? thy !

replies.body:
ok , something was wrong with the surface.

did instead a flat box and it worked ,  then exploded it used only the upper surface and it worked again...

I would bet that the Normal direction was pointing to the "wrong" side. Change it and it should work.

The disFromBase just offsets the resulting mesh results from the original one, avoiding though coplanarity.

(Just trying to ease a bit on Mosthapa ... :-) )

-A.
